title.text: The default value of the 'allowCodeExecution' allows stringified resources

callback:
function callback(chart){chart.renderer.label('This label is added in the stringified callback.
Highcharts version '+Highcharts.version,100,100).attr({id:'renderer-callback-label',fill:'#90ed7d',padding:10,r:10,zIndex:10}).css({color:'black',width:'100px'}).add();}
resources: {"js":"Highcharts.charts[0].update({xAxis:{title:{text:'Title from the resources stringified object, js section'}}});","css":".highcharts-yaxis .highcharts-axis-line {stroke-width:2px;stroke:#FF0000;}"}
